mutils.title: ModpackUtils Config
mutils.menuAlert.desc: Shows a toast on the 'Main Menu'.
mutils.chatAlert.desc: Sends a chat message, on joining a world.
mutils.chatMessage.desc: The message shown, when 'Chat Alert' is enabled.
mutils.platform.desc:
Modrinth: Uses the Modrinth API to fetch modpack data.
Custom: Supports Packwiz! You can also use a 'txt' file with a 'version = ""' field.
mutils.modpackName.desc: The modpack name displayed in update messages.
mutils.modpackId.desc: The project slug of your modpack on Modrinth.
mutils.modpackHome.desc: The link to the main website where your modpack is available to download.
mutils.checkMcVersion.desc: Fetches the modpack version compatible with the current Minecraft version.
mutils.versionAPI.desc: The link of your modpack's 'pack.toml' file, if using Packwiz. You can also use a 'txt' file with a 'version = ""' field.
mutils.changelogLink.desc: The link to your latest changelog file. This same file is updated with every new version published.
mutils.versionType.desc: Fetches the modpack version based on the selected version type, such as release, beta, or alpha.
mutils.chatWelcomeMessage.desc: The message shown, when 'Chat Welcome' is enabled.
mutils.customIcon.desc: A custom icon will be applied to the game window. You need to put the icon files in 'config/mutils/icons'.
mutils.customTitle.desc: A custom title will be applied to the game window.
mutils.cTitle.desc: The placeholders in '<>' are filled automatically.
mutils.mmcIntg.desc:
Normal: A simple text is shown on the Main Menu screen.
Fancy: Detailed, colorful lines of text are shown on the Main Menu screen.
Custom: Refer to the wiki for info.
mutils.customMmc.desc: 3 entries required for each line. The placeholders in '<>' are filled automatically.
mutils.ramMenuAlert.desc: Shows a toast on the 'Main Menu'.
mutils.ramChatAlert.desc: Sends a chat message, on joining a world.
